pages.privacy-policy: DriftwoodInn Privacy Policy - Data Protection and Your Rights DriftwoodInn Home About us Casino Contact Your Privacy Policies at Driftwood Shores Welcome to Driftwood Shores' Privacy Policy! We prioritize your privacy and want you to feel confident using our website. This policy explains how we collect, use, protect, and disclose your information when you visit our website (hereafter referred to as the "Website"). Please take a moment to review this policy carefully. If you disagree with its terms, kindly refrain from accessing the Website. Information We Gather We may collect personal data from you during your visit to our Website, such as registration, placing an order, subscribing to our newsletter, responding to surveys, or filling out forms. The information we collect may include your name, email address, mailing address, phone number, and any additional details you choose to provide. Using Your Information The information we gather from you during registration, purchases, newsletter subscriptions, survey responses, marketing communication interactions, website browsing, or using certain features may be used for the following purposes: To personalize your experience and tailor content and product offerings to your interests. To enhance our website and better serve your needs. To improve our ability to respond to your customer service inquiries. To manage contests, promotions, surveys, or other website features. Safeguarding Your Information We employ various security measures to ensure the safety of your personal information when you place an order or enter, submit, or access your personal information. We utilize a secure server. All sensitive information, including credit card details, is transmitted via Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology and encrypted within our databases for access only as authorized above. Policy Updates We may occasionally update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons.
